q1: Is Messi still doing well playing for Barcelona?
a1: Messi is doing very well for Barcelona.
q2: messi is top boy at barca
a2: For now, but it career seems to be on the decline
q3: He's getting older, but still clearly one of the best in the world.
a3: He can still be the face of football for another 2 years at least
q4: Who on Barcelona's roster will step up?
a4: Arturo Vidal believes he is making a step up by leaving Bayern Munich for Barcelona, revealing his delight to join "the best team in the world".
a5: It seems possible at the very least
